CustomField.formula: IF( Prospect_Client__c != null, "Type:" + TEXT(Prospect_Client__r.Type) + " Method: " + TEXT(Prospect_Client__r.Current_Prior_Method__c) + " Nbr Emps: " + TEXT(Prospect_Client__r.NumberOfEmployees) , IF( Lead__c != null, "Method: " + TEXT(Lead__r.Current_Prior_Method__c) + " Nbr Emps: " + TEXT(Lead__r.NumberOfEmployees), "")) + IF( NOT(ISBLANK(NextCallback__c)), " Next CB: "+TEXT(MONTH(NextCallbackDate__c)) +"/" +TEXT(DAY(NextCallbackDate__c)) +"/"+ TEXT(YEAR(NextCallbackDate__c)), "")
CustomField.label: NSS Admin Info
